metadata.title: CVE-2024-12243 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in GnuTLS, which relies on libtasn1 for ASN.1 dataprocessing. Due to an inefficient algorithm in libtasn1, decoding certainDER-encoded certificate data can take excessive time, leading to increasedresource consumption. This flaw allows a remote attacker to send aspecially crafted certificate, causing GnuTLS to become unresponsive orslow, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

criterions.comment: gnutls28 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
